info.description: API for the creation and management of credit agreements for Corporate customers. The types of credit agreements are Single Level Facility, Credit Agreement with Multiple Facilities, Club Loans with Agency and Syndicated Loans.
info.title: Corporate Credit Agreements

post.summary: Creates an offer for a deal contract
post.description: Creates new offer Deal for the required customer when the mandatory input details are provided. Offer Deal creates a draft contract and allows the users to negotiate multiple times. Offer Deal is a draft contract and will not affect the Balance sheet of the bank.

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

post.summary: Creates an offer for a facility contract
post.description: Creates a new offer Facility for the required customer when at least the mandatory input is provided. Offer Facility creates a draft contract and allow the users to negotiate multiple times. Offer facility is a draft contract and will not affect the Balance sheet of the bank.

post.description: Deletes a new offer for the required deal contract when at least the mandatory input is provided. Deal offer is a draft contract, which allow the user to delete the contract online and deal offer contract will not affect the balance sheet of the bank.

post.summary: Accept the deal offer and execute the contract to live
post.description: On executing acceptance, the contract is changed from Offer to live deal for the required customer when at least the mandatory input is provided. Process will check all the required mandatory inputs and prompt an error message when mandatory details are not provided. Once the accept deal offer is processed further offer negotiation is not allowed.

post.description: Create rollover process from the facility where the rollover could be a Split rollover, Merge rollover or a one to one rollover. Split also called as one to many will rollover an old loan and create multiple new offer loans. Merge also called as many to one will rollover multiple old loans simultaneously and create a single new offer loan. Rollover also called as one to one will simply rollover an old loan and create a new offer loan

post.description: Create rollover process from the drawdown where the rollover could be a Split rollover, Merge rollover or a one to one rollover. Rollover also called as one to one will simply rollover an old loan and create a new offer loan

arrangementStatus.description: Status of the arrangement. E.g. AUTH, CLOSE, UNAUTH etc.

currency.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

product.description: Contains the name of the product

commitmentStartDate.description: Defines the start date for the commitmentAmount for the Commitment type

commitmentSchedule.description: Commitment schedule is used to define the facility commitment amount at different points in time during the term of the facility. The schedule can be increasing, decreasing or mixed.

unavailabilitySchedule.description: Unavailability schedule is used to define the unavailable commitment amount of the facility at different points in time. This is used to derive the available commitment amount for utilization out of the total facility commitment at any given point in time during the term of the facility.

totalCommitment.description: Specifies the total available commitment amounts  specific to a credit facility

dealId.description: Unique identifier (contract number) of the corporate deals

currency.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

product.description: Contains the name of the product

currentCommitment.description: This balance corresponds to the current unutilized commitment of the contract

utilisedCommitment.description: This balance corresponds to the current utilized commitment of the contract

availableCommitment.description: This balance corresponds to the portion of unutilized commitment that is available to be drawn

unAvailableCommitment.description: This balance corresponds to the portion of unutilized commitment that is unavailable for drawing

overdrawnCommitment.description: This balance corresponds to any amount that is drawn more than the approved commitment amount in a contract.

virtualBalance.description: Contains the virtual balance of the collateral

balanceType.description: Type of balance (e.g. current balance, credit interest accrued, deferred commission, etc.) as defined in the institution's accounting schemas.

payoutSettlement.description: Flag to indicate whether Payout Settlement instruction is required or not.Valid input is Yes or No.Default value is Yes.

payoutSettlementActivity.description: Contains the transaction type used for settlement of the payables

payoutPropertyClass.description: Contains the different payout options, for example charge, interest or principal on which the payout settlement instructions would be processed

payoutProperty.description: Contains the different payout options, for example management charge, principal interest or commitment on which the payout settlement instructions would be processed

payoutAccount.description: The account to which a settlement amount is transferred.

payoutBeneficiary.description: The beneficiary that payment should be made to .

payoutPOProduct.description: Contains the payout payment order product for which payment is initiated

payoutPercentage.description: Contains the percentage of the payment amount used for settlement of the payables

payoutAmount.description: Contains the finite amount of the payment used for settlement of the payables

payoutActivity.description: Contains the transaction type used to credit the customer account for settlement of the payables

assocSettlement.description: Indicates the transaction reference for which the history of transactions is requested. It is steered by the attribute 'booked' given the start date and end date or the entry from which the history is requested

payinSettlement.description: Flag to indicate whether Payin Settlement instruction is required or not.Valid input is Yes or No.Default value is Yes.

payinRule.description: Contains the rule on which the system should utilise the funds available in the pay in account during the settlement process. Options are Full, Partial and None

payinSettlementActivity.description: Contains the transaction type used for settlement of the bills due

payinRCType.description: Contains the transaction type used by the transaction recycler for retrying the debits

payinRCCondition.description: Contains the transaction recycling rules which define the set of retry conditions

paymentType.description: Indicates if the payment is Customer (C) type or Bank (B) type

ddMandateReference.description: Contains the direct debit mandate reference (dd) when the settlement method is set to direct debit. The dd reference is typically the account number followed by a suffix, for example 15245.1

payinBeneficiary.description: Contains the beneficiary Id used for settlement of the bills due

payinPOProduct.description: Contains the payment order product Id for which the payment is initiated

payinPercentage.description: Contains the percentage of the payment amount used for settlement of the bills due

payinAmount.description: Contains the finite amount of the payment used for settlement of the bills due

payinActivity.description: Contains the transaction type used to debit the customer account for settlement of the bills due

defaultSettlementAccount.description: Default settlement account to be used for all incoming payments and outgoing settlements when a specific settlement account is not provided for each payment type
